Section.Summary: This enumeration is used to identify an advertisement error.

member.name: Unknown
member.summary: Indicates that an unknown or unexpected error occurred.

member.name: ServerFailure
member.summary: Indicates that the connection to the advertisements server failed.

member.name: LoadingThrottled
member.summary: Indicates that the download from the advertisements server is currently being throttled.

member.name: InventoryUnavailable
member.summary: Indicates that no advertisements are currently available to download.

member.name: ConfigurationError
member.summary: Indicates that your application has not been configured to receive advertisements.

member.name: BannerVisibleWithoutContent
member.summary: Indicates that the banner is visible, but no advertisement is shown.

member.name: ApplicationInactive
member.summary: Indicates that ad content is not available because the application is not currently active.
